meanings.definition: Having or revealing little emotion or sensibility; impassive.
meanings.sent1: The stolidest man at the funeral showed no tears.
meanings.sent2: She remained stolidest during the scary movie, not flinching once.
meanings.sent3: Even when the clown fell, the stolidest audience member didn't crack a smile.
meanings.sent4: Her face was as stolidest as a stone wall, giving nothing away.
meanings.sent5: The stolidest soldier faced the enemy without a hint of fear.

meanings.definition: Not easily stirred or moved mentally; unemotional; impassive.
meanings.sent1: The stolidest student in class never showed excitement for anything.
meanings.sent2: He remained stolidest even when his favorite team lost the game.
meanings.sent3: The stolidest robot in the factory never malfunctioned or showed emotion.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as stolidest as a robot's, monotone and unchanging.
meanings.sent5: The stolidest mountain stood unmoved by the passing storms.
